title: Simplify site theme to 1–2 premium brand colors (remove multi-accent palette)

requirements.text: Update the global styling system to use only 1–2 premium brand colors across the site (for accents, buttons, highlights, gradients, icons, and rings), replacing the current multi-accent palette usage (teal/green/amber/pink/violet/cyan/orange/purple/etc.).

quotes: I want ki ap mere web me 1 or 2 premium colour use kare na ki multiple colour

acceptanceCriteria: Across all pages/components, accent styling is limited to a maximum of two brand colors (plus neutrals like background/foreground/muted/border).
No UI elements (text, borders, rings, icons, buttons, badges, gradients) rely on the rotating accent palette or subject/route-based accent variety.
Light and dark mode remain readable with sufficient contrast, and no broken styles/classes appear.

requirements.text: Refactor the accent utility layer (frontend/src/utils/accents.ts) so it no longer rotates through many accent colors by route/subject/index, and instead exposes a small, fixed set of brand accent styles (max two) that components can use consistently.

quotes: I want ki ap mere web me 1 or 2 premium colour use kare na ki multiple colour

acceptanceCriteria: Utilities in frontend/src/utils/accents.ts do not produce more than two accent variants.
Pages/components that currently call getAccentByIndex/getRouteAccent/getSubjectAccent (or similar) are updated to use the new fixed brand accent(s).
No Tailwind class generation relies on dynamic/interpolated accent names (i.e., avoid patterns that Tailwind cannot statically detect).

requirements.text: Update key UI components and pages that currently use multi-color gradients and mixed accent classes (e.g., Header, Footer, HomePage sections) to use a consistent 1–2 color premium theme, including removing multi-stop gradient text that blends multiple accent colors.

quotes: I want ki ap mere web me 1 or 2 premium colour use kare na ki multiple colour

acceptanceCriteria: Header branding (logo ring, title text, nav active/hover styles, auth buttons) uses only the chosen 1–2 brand colors for accents.
Footer social icons, headings, and highlights use only the chosen 1–2 brand colors for accents (no teal/pink/violet mix).
Home page hero/title/CTA and section background gradient utilities use only the chosen 1–2 brand colors for accent/decoration (no multi-accent gradients).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn UI sources are read-only).
Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep changes limited to theme/color usage; do not change authentication logic or backend behavior.
nonGoals: Adding new pages or features unrelated to theming.
Implementing new authentication or performance optimizations (not requested in the current message).
